title: Assess Clinical Trial Feasibility
description: A clinical scientist needs to assess the feasibility of a proposed trial design by analyzing patient data.

tasks.description: Define a set of draft inclusion/exclusion criteria for a new study.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a list of potential criteria for the study.

tasks.description: Model the impact of the criteria by querying a real-world evidence database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent queries the database and finds that the initial criteria are too strict and result in too few eligible patients.

tasks.description: Iteratively adjust the criteria and re-run the model to find an optimal balance between scientific rigor and recruitment feasibility.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent modifies the criteria (e.g., widens an age range) and finds a scenario that yields a sufficient number of patients.

tasks.description: Generate a feasibility report with the final recommended criteria and projected enrollment numbers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report to support the final protocol design.
